long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When you access to youtube(https://www.youtube.com/) and watch movies, you  are obligated to see an advertisement (approximately for 5 seconds) at  the beginning of every movies.
However, after installing this plugin, you can automatically skip advertisements on every movies.
After installing and activate this plugin, you need no more action, and can automatically skip advertisements.
